short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moon is a smart personal organizer for your Internet stuff, starting with recipes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Add recipes from anywhere across the web. 
- Get cooking with clean, uncluttered recipe cards.
- Shape your experience with your voice and votes.

Mission: To re-organize the Internet's information, and make it universally useful and privately accessible, so you can make smarter decisions. Moon aims to help you organize the Internet the way you want. Moon is a mirror of you.
